title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: IB-PYP Transdisciplinary Curriculum Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can explain the transdisciplinary integrated curriculum design process within the IB-PYP framework in three stages (planning-execution-evaluation)
Can generate five or more curriculum ideas collaboratively with experts from other fields using brainstorming techniques
Can identify three technical constraints when designing project-based assessments in mobile environments and propose solutions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
